Class Perk

java.lang.Object
logic.Perk
All Implemented Interfaces:
Buyable
public class Perk extends Object implements Buyable
This class represent temporary perks to buff skill of mouse click and generator.

  • Constructor Details

    • Perk

      public Perk(String name, int duration, int cooldown, double cost)
      Initialize all fields. Set activeTimer = 0. Set coolDownTimer = 0.
      Parameters:
      name - the perk's name
      duration - the amount of time that perk active
      cooldown - the amount of time that perk cooldown
      cost - the amount of money to buy this perk

  • Method Details

    • tick

      public void tick()
      If (isActive): count duration activation time. Check If(activeTimer invalid input: '<'= 0): Set perk not Active and start countdown cooldown timer. Else if (cooldown Timer > 0) countdown cooldown timer.

    • buy

      public void buy(GameManager gameManager)
      Checks affordability. If affordable, deducts money, calls activate().
      Specified by:
      buy in interface Buyable
      Parameters:
      gameManager - the game manager instance

    • isAffordable

      public boolean isAffordable(double currentMoney)
      Returns true if currentMoney is greater than or equal to cost.
      Specified by:
      isAffordable in interface Buyable
      Parameters:
      currentMoney - the player's current money
      Returns:
      true if affordable

    • getCost

      public double getCost()
      Return cost of this perk.
      Specified by:
      getCost in interface Buyable
      Returns:
      the cost

    • isReady

      public boolean isReady()
      Check ready when is not active and cooldown Timer invalid input: '<'= 0.
      Returns:
      true if the perk is ready to be activated

      public boolean isActive()
